author: David Raven
title: Bellingham car crash: Five people rushed to hospital after vehicle ploughs into pedestrians - Mirror Online
text:

Five people have been rushed to hospital after a car ploughed into pedestrians in London. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story. 
For the latest news and breaking news visit Mirror.co.uk/news .
